welcome_message_body: Welcome to Torrevieja, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant atmosphere, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Javier Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Javier Airport, mainly used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alicante El Altet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Alicante El Altet Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
